channel.title: Making Owner have crowns?
channel.description:
I still have yet to figure this out, I have the Owner.png in Client/cache/sprites/players/owner.png and I can't figure out how to link it to in-game so there's a crown. ?
This is a [pi] server.

item.title: Making Owner have crowns?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“T0rvascape, post:11, topic:470421”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=587904.msg4170334#msg4170334 date=1354229644]

Shit. Well. That means it’s cache packed.
Do you want to edit the cache packed ones or would you just want to hard code it (nasty way)

I just want to keep it simple;

Both are simple (to me). But one’s faster then the other.
[/quote]
help me out with it?[/quote]
Sure, just pm me, or add on skype:
punk14rock88

Read full topic

item.title: Making Owner have crowns?
item.dc:creator: @T0rvascape T0rvascape
item.description:
@T0rvascape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:470421”][quote author=T0rvascape link=topic=587904.msg4170305#msg4170305 date=1354228049]

I still have yet to figure this out, I have the Owner.png in Client/cache/sprites/players/owner.png and I can’t figure out how to link it to in-game so there’s a crown.
?

This is a [pi] server.

Crowns are client sided, then called into the server.
I’d suggest you change that name of “Owner.png” to something like “MOD ICONX.png” (that’s what most servers use…)

I changed it to Mod ICON2.png
[/quote]
Are there custom crowns already? Or what? Is it all in the cache files (Meaning. If there are no other MOD ICONs, then it’s in the cache).
If it’s in the cache, you will need to either A) edit the cache and replace the icons. Or B) make it read the icons from the cache folders instead of the packed cache.

–Requesting Mod to move to client section–[/quote]
Nope, no custom crowns.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Owner have crowns?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“T0rvascape, post:5, topic:470421”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=587904.msg4170298#msg4170298 date=1354227868]

I still have yet to figure this out, I have the Owner.png in Client/cache/sprites/players/owner.png and I can’t figure out how to link it to in-game so there’s a crown.
?

This is a [pi] server.

Crowns are client sided, then called into the server.
I’d suggest you change that name of “Owner.png” to something like “MOD ICONX.png” (that’s what most servers use…)
[/quote]
I changed it to Mod ICON2.png[/quote]
Are there custom crowns already? Or what? Is it all in the cache files (Meaning. If there are no other MOD ICONs, then it’s in the cache).
If it’s in the cache, you will need to either A) edit the cache and replace the icons. Or B) make it read the icons from the cache folders instead of the packed cache.

–Requesting Mod to move to client section–

Read full topic
